Text: Thanks a lot. I just found there's a lot of really cool Linux based software out there that I'd really like to use but I don't know the first thing a bout linux. This really helped.
Good book, good stuff to go deeper into Linux, but this is in Microsoft's .chm Format, which is a tad irritating for a book about Linux

Thanks for the suggestion Tuvokk, I will keep that in mind. 

Though, following URL will assist one who wants to read CHM on Linux:
